entry.title: CSP base-uri can be bypassed (Chrome in 2025???)

link.title: CSP base-uri can be bypassed (Chrome in 2025???)

entry.summary:
What is base-uri the base-uri directive controls which urls can be used in the <base> element of an html document. without it, an attacker could inject a tag and change how all relative urls (scripts, images, css, links, forms) are resolved
content-security-policy: base-uri 'self'
‘self’ → only allow the same origin specific urls → only allow those hosts ‘none’ → completely disa...

entry.title: TFC CTF 2025 Write Up
entry.summary:
Slippy (Baby)

the flag file is made under the $rand_dir directory but we cannot search the file name in /proc/self/mounts or smth like this
